name: ADOLicenseManagement
description: Help reduce Azure DevOps user license cost. Change AzDO user license from Basic or Test to Stakeholder based on number of days inactive
author: Aammir Mirza
releaseNotes: Script task consistency. Added support for macOS and Linux.

inputs.name: AccessToken
inputs.label: AccessToken
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access token with sufficinet permission to change 'User Entitlements'. Use as pipeline variable with masking.

inputs.name: usersExcludedFromLicenseChange
inputs.label: usersExcludedFromLicenseChange
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of users with ','separated and delimeted emails, this users will be excluded from change of entitlement i.e. Basic / Basic+Test to Stakeholders

messages.JS_InvalidErrorActionPreference: Invalid ErrorActionPreference '%s'. The value must be one of: 'Stop', or 'SilentlyContinue'
